Phrase.Name: Voteban Description
Phrase.en: Starts a vote to temporarily ban a player from the server

Phrase.Name: Votekick Description
Phrase.en: Starts a vote to kick a player from the server

Phrase.Name: Voteban Started
Phrase.en: A vote has begun to ban {1} from the server

Phrase.Name: Voteban Succeeded
Phrase.en: Vote succeeded with {1} of the vote. Banning {2}...

Phrase.Name: Votekick Started
Phrase.en: A vote has begun to kick {1} from the server

Phrase.Name: Votekick Succeeded
Phrase.en: Vote succeeded with {1} of the vote. Kicking {2}...

Phrase.Name: Vote Failed
Phrase.en: Vote failed with {1} of the vote.
